name: Spring Game 45-in-1 (Spring Spring)
description:
A compilation of many old, unfinished game prototypes developed between 2015 and 2022, with a nice little multicart menu. However, the menu application provided does not launch every game correctly at the moment, for some reason.

There is nonetheless a lot of interesting variety in the many odd games you can explore here - even if many of them are rough and unfinished. ViLXDRYAD made the awesome cover art.
